tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_data(
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name TEXT,
  yield DECIMAL,
  soil_quality INT,
  weather_conditions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_yield (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  yield_amount DECIMAL,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  season VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_quality (
  soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  soil_type VARCHAR(255),
  pH_level DECIMAL,
  fertility_rating VARCHAR(50),
  moisture_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    soil_id INT,
    weather_id INT,
    research_notes TEXT
);
